name: BreakItTechDemo
description:
WIP Tech Demo from a visual story game production. The game lets you explore different interactions that will introduce colour, objects and new events to the game. The character starts out in a seemingly grey world that little by little expands and changes as they find new ways forward.
Interaction with the kitchen sink mechanic preview. (Click To Interact)

After you are done testing, please fill out the following google form: 

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfDw_uoVcsjDlysqJFCOyZMTR4tLf0Qyl1wmKWpLY1FrlqBWg/viewform?usp=sf_link

Note: "Break it" is a work in progress title, which will eventually change.
